SEARCH
Package com.example.cmput301_team_project.model

Class PublicUser

java.lang.Object
com.example.cmput301_team_project.model.PublicUser
public class PublicUser extends Object
The PublicUser class includes methods and values that represent a public Moodster user. The methods involve getting the public users username and display name, as well as getting and setting user followRelationships.
